name: Tomb of the Lily Lich
description:
As the faithful crow servant of the now deceased Lily Lich, you have been tasked with caring for the root of their power. You must guide the lily towards a hero's tomb in order to resurrect the lich and receive your reward.

Completed for GBJam 10

** FIXED: Arrow keys moving browser page along with arrow keys, and a collision bug that let you not water the vine. Should be able to play and finish the game now.

__________________________________________________

Controls: 

  •    WASD/Arrow Keys: Move Crow throughout the graveyard
  •     Z Button Press: Swing Scythe to cut away weeds, change vine direction.
  •     Z Button Hold: Scratch Ground with Scythe to create dirt that vines will grow along. 
  •     X Button Press: Put out fires and water vine.

__________________________________________________

Art and Design: Allison Vansickle
Code: Royce Rogers and Steve Smith
Music: Redmond Orbit (https://redmondorbit.bandcamp.com/)
